About

About me

Hello, and welcome on my home page!

I am a software engineer, since I graduated from the INSA Lyon, one of the most prestigious French engineering universities, in July 2009.

I currently work for Multicom, a software editor, in Bristol (UK).

You can find on this website my personal information, where to find me on the internet, how to contact me…
